zh-cn: 温斯顿·雷欧纳德·斯宾塞·邱吉尔

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家、演说家、军官、历史学家、作家与画家，曾两度担任英国首相，领导英国赢得第二次世界大战。
description.en: British statesman, orator, officer, historian, writer, and artist who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom twice, leading Britain to victory in the Second World War.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Winston Churchill.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔的父亲，曾任英国财政大臣。
description.en: Father of Winston Churchill, served as Chancellor of the Exchequer.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔的母亲，美国富豪之女。
description.en: Mother of Winston Churchill, daughter of an American millionaire.

description.zh-cn: 英国前首相，因推行绥靖政策而闻名。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, known for his policy of appeasement.

description.zh-cn: 二战前英法等国为避免战争对法西斯侵略采取的姑息政策。
description.en: A policy of making concessions to the dictatorial powers in order to avoid conflict, pursued by Britain and France before WWII.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国元首，第二次世界大战的发动者。
description.en: Führer of Nazi Germany, initiator of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，主要由轴心国与同盟国之间进行。
description.en: A global military conflict mainly between the Axis powers and the Allies.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治家，曾任丘吉尔的副首相，后接替其成为首相。
description.en: British Labour politician who served as Churchill's Deputy Prime Minister and later succeeded him as Prime Minister.

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，二战期间同盟国的关键领导人。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States, a key leader of the Allies during World War II.

nodes.id: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

zh-cn: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，二战期间同盟国“三巨头”之一。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union, one of the 'Big Three' Allied leaders during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在美国发表的著名演说，被认为是冷战开始的标志。
description.en: A famous speech delivered by Churchill in the United States, considered a marker for the beginning of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 二战后以美国为首的西方阵营与以苏联为首的东方阵营之间的政治对抗。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union, after World War II.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个中右翼政党。
description.en: A centre-right political party in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个主要政党，后与社会民主党合并为自由民主党。
description.en: A major political party in the United Kingdom, later merged with the Social Democratic Party to form the Liberal Democrats.

description.zh-cn: 二战时期的英国国王。
description.en: King of the United Kingdom during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 英国女王，在丘吉尔第二次首相任期内登基。
description.en: Queen of the United Kingdom, who ascended to the throne during Churchill's second term as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，曾任丘吉尔的副首相，后接替其成为首相。
description.en: British politician who served as Churchill's Deputy Prime Minister and later succeeded him as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战期间，协约国为夺取达达尼尔海峡而发动的战役，以失败告终。
description.en: A campaign of the First World War that took place on the Gallipoli peninsula, launched by the Allies to seize the Dardanelles, which ended in failure.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间纳粹德国对英国发动的大规模空战。
description.en: A large-scale air campaign waged by the German Air Force against the United Kingdom during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一所著名公学。
description.en: A famous public school in England.

nodes.id: 桑赫斯特皇家军事学院

zh-cn: 桑赫斯特皇家军事学院

description.zh-cn: 英国陆军的军官训练中心。
description.en: The British Army's initial officer training centre.

location.zh-cn: 英国牛津郡伍德斯托克

relationships.target: 桑赫斯特皇家军事学院

description.zh-cn: 于1940年至1955年担任保守党党魁。
description.en: Served as Leader of the Conservative Party from 1940 to 1955.

description.zh-cn: 两度出任英国首相。
description.en: Served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom twice.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔是希特勒和纳粹主义的坚定反对者，并领导同盟国战胜了轴心国。
description.en: Churchill was a staunch opponent of Hitler and Nazism, and led the Allies to victory over the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 在二战前，丘吉尔是少数公开抨击对纳粹德国实行绥靖政策的政治家之一。
description.en: Before World War II, Churchill was one of the few politicians to publicly criticize the policy of appeasement towards Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 作为英国首相，张伯伦是绥靖政策的主要推行者。
description.en: As Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Chamberlain was the main proponent of the policy of appeasement.

description.zh-cn: 作为战时首相，丘吉尔通过其演说和领导，鼓舞了英国人民和军队，赢得了不列颠战役。
description.en: As wartime Prime Minister, Churchill inspired the British people and military through his speeches and leadership to win the Battle of Britain.

relationships.target: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 两人在二战期间建立了密切的个人友谊和政治同盟，对同盟国的胜利至关重要。
description.en: The two leaders developed a close personal friendship and political alliance during World War II, which was crucial for the Allied victory.

relationships.target: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 尽管丘吉尔是坚定的反共者，但在二战期间为了共同对抗纳粹德国，他与斯大林建立了战时合作关系。
description.en: Although a staunch anti-communist, Churchill formed a wartime alliance with Stalin to fight their common enemy, Nazi Germany, during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔的“铁幕演说”被广泛认为是冷战开始的标志性事件，它明确了东西方阵营的对立。
description.en: Churchill's 'Iron Curtain speech' is widely regarded as a seminal event that marked the beginning of the Cold War by defining the division between the Eastern and Western blocs.

description.zh-cn: 艾德礼在丘吉尔的战时联合政府中担任副首相。
description.en: Attlee served as Deputy Prime Minister in Churchill's wartime coalition government.

description.zh-cn: 领导工党在1945年大选中击败丘吉尔领导的保守党，成为新任首相。
description.en: Led the Labour Party to victory over Churchill's Conservative Party in the 1945 general election, becoming the new Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在乔治六世国王在位期间担任首相。
description.en: Churchill served as Prime Minister during the reign of King George VI.

description.zh-cn: 丘吉尔在伊丽莎白二世女王在位初期担任首相。
description.en: Churchill served as Prime Minister during the early reign of Queen Elizabeth II.

description.zh-cn: 艾登在丘吉尔的第二届政府中担任副首相，并最终接替他成为首相。
description.en: Eden served as Deputy Prime Minister in Churchill's second government and eventually succeeded him as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 时任第一海军大臣的丘吉尔批准并推动了达达尼尔海峡的进攻计划。
description.en: As First Lord of the Admiralty, Churchill approved and pushed the plan to attack the Dardanelles.

description.zh-cn: 战役的失败导致丘吉尔的政治声望严重受损，并被迫辞去第一海军大臣的职务。
description.en: The failure of the campaign severely damaged Churchill's political reputation and forced him to resign as First Lord of the Admiralty.
